name: Route17BusTracker
0:
”Alexa, launch seventeen bus tracker”
”Alexa, launch 17 bus tracker”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: seventeen bus tracker
des:
App to check where the closest Northbound bus to the stop '20th St and Washington Ave' is on the Septa route 17. 
This app can also tell whether there are any detours Northbound on route 17.
Septa api (http://www3.septa.org/hackathon/) is being made use of by this application 

- To know where the bus closest to '20th St and Washington Ave' is, say 'wheres my bus'
- To check if there are any detours on SEPTA route 17, say, 'is my bus on a detour'
